text.name: Firebird Egg
text.description:
{Firebird Egg}

Summons a stack of Firebirds in the beginning of the battle.
text.event: During your adventures, you find yourself in the territory of the wealthy prince. You see a guarded golden cage with a firebird in it. After you distract the guards, you open the cage. When the bird escaped, you see a fiery egg in the cage. You've decided to make that prince lose their morning omelette and ran away.
